item.description:
Abrahadabra is actually an Aramaic based word that roughly translated means "I create as I speak."

What are you creating? Is it what you want to be creating?

In this meetup we'll be discussing the "stories" you tell (how you talk and think about a topic) and how to best language them so that you'll be creating the experiences you want to have.

As a part of this, we'll also be covering how to speak and how to use affirmations in a way that is truly believable to you. Otherwise, you will still create what you don't want!

We'll take some time to uncover a story you might be carrying that's holding you back; and then you'll get to shift it to something that will be more effective and will feel better, too!

Please remember to RSVP, and after you do so, please let us know if your plans change, so we wonâ€™t be waiting for you unnecessarily or waste any handouts and snacks.

There's nothing better than feeling good and having fun! Please join us and stay "connected" by participating in our community's message board discussions and receiving our e-mails (which will include our "Good Vibrations" tips and news). To be able to do so, go to your account, and under "Your Groups", each one has an "Edit email settings". Set your preferences there. Hope to hear from you!

Eagerly looking forward to co-creating with you!

Ann and Mark
item.how_to_find_us: Please check the files section (under "More" at top of page) for important parking info. and directions

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Abrahadabra! The magic of creating as you speak
